newsitem.title: USA: National Computer buys electronic testing company.
newsitem.headline: National Computer buys electronic testing company.

text.p: National Computer Systems Inc said Friday it has completed acquisition of Virtual University Enterprises, a Bloomington, Minn.-based electronic course registration and electronic testing company.
Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
National Computer Systems provides test scoring, analysis and reporting services.
National Computer Systems said Virtual University will provide it with entry into the electronic testing and certification market for professionals.
Shares of National Computer Systems were trading off 1/4 to 24-3/4.
